body:
This is where i'll be posting whenever i'll be streaming avicus or anything minecraft.

Link to Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/xiterracubist (might change it soon)

Schedule: Whenever i feel like it but will try stream regularly (atleast twice a week)

Extra Info:
- Old IGNs: https://namemc.com/profile/Izutsushi/a85b
- Age: 17
- Country: Philippines
- Language: English, Filipino (Currently Self-Studying Japanese, THE PROPER WAY...)
- What do i stream on? A Laptop which was never meant to be a gaming laptop but its apparently a beast now...
- Any Other Info? will be answered when asked about anything on stream cuz its 3am and im too tired to think right now
